resources.string: Notify me if the forecast changes
Weather notifications enabled for %s . You will be notified if there are sudden changes in the forecast (thunderstorms, snow, hurricanes, etc).
Send today\'s weather data to your contacts via text message
Select a city manually in the menu list
No weather data, touch to refresh
Play animation in the main interface
You need to enable location access via your mobile network.
It\'s a great day to be outdoors.
People with special medical conditions should consider reducing prolonged or heavy exertion while outside.
People with heart or lung disease, senior citizens, and young children should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion while outside.
Everyone should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion while outside.
People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should avoid all physical activity outside. Everyone else should avoid prolonged or heavy exertion outside.
Everyone should avoid all physical activity outdoors. People with heart or lung disease, senior citizens, and young children should remain indoors and keep activity levels low.
Access network to get weather information.
Global weather info has been added.
